SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am01
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am01.network

Interface Connection<S extends NetworkMessage,R extends NetworkMessage>

Type Parameters:
S - the type of messages that can be sent through this connection.
R - the type of messages that can be received through this connection.
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseRMIConnection, BaseTCPConnection, ClientRMIConnection, ClientTCPConnection, ServerRMIConnection, ServerTCPConnection
public interface Connection<S extends NetworkMessage,R extends NetworkMessage>
A connection to a remote host. Could be a connection from a client to a server or vice versa.

A connection can be used to send and receive messages. Sending a message never blocks, while receiving a message can block. Messages are delivered in the order they were sent.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    close()
    Closes this connection.
    R
    receive()
    Retrieves the next message from the connection.
    void
    send(S message)
    Sends a message through this connection.

  • Method Details

    • send

      void send(S message) throws SendNetworkException
      Sends a message through this connection.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to send.
      Throws:
      SendNetworkException - if an error occurs while sending the message.

    • receive

      R receive() throws ReceiveNetworkException
      Retrieves the next message from the connection. If no message is available, this method blocks until a message is received.
      Returns:
      the next message.
      Throws:
      ReceiveNetworkException - if an error occurs while receiving the message.

    • close

      void close() throws CloseNetworkException
      Closes this connection.

      Once a Connection has been closed:

      • it cannot be reopened
      • send(NetworkMessage) can no longer be called
      • any messages that have been previously received, can still be retrieved by calling receive()
      Throws:
      CloseNetworkException
